title: Oof! Something went wrong error
body: Hello! I just recently wanted to play a game on dynamic queue but after champ select the game crashed and had to close it, while trying to rejoin, the game seem to have crashed again, and opened a new client but it didn't sent me to the rejoin page, and when I wanted to play again I got this error, after a few client restarts I got something called leave buster asking to type that I wont leave games again, am I going to get banned or something? I couldn't even join the game so I was wondering what can I do to prevent this?

replies.body:
The warning message you got is not meant to threaten you with a ban. It's simply a message to let you know that disconnections affect everyone in the match, and a trend of disconnections can result in low priority queues on your account.

The "Oof!" error is often a result of your client not being able to maintain a stable connection to the server. As a first step, I recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through those steps.
